name: Dachzerul
content:
Dachzerul

The Darkness Behind Toy

Source Book of the Damned pg. 132
Pathfinder Wiki Dachzerul

Details

Alignment CE
Pantheon Sahkil Tormentors
Areas of Concern Deadly pranks, stalkers, sudden death
Domains Charm, Evil, Luck, Trickery
Subdomains Curse, Deception, Fear
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Rapier

Obedience

Obsess on revenge against one who wronged you. Gain a +2 profane bonus on Bluff and Stealth checks.

Boons - Sahkil Tormentors

Source Book of the Damned pg. 132
Sahkil tormentors hold dominion over mortal fears and suffering. All are chaotic evil and range in power from CR 21 to CR 25. Their boons are less complex than those of other demigods, manifesting as spell-like abilities usable twice per day each.

1: summon monster VI
2: phantasmal killer
3: mislead
